textAfterTable: Biographical Sketch Parthasarathy Guturu Dr. Guturu received the Bachelorâs and Ph.D. (Eng.) degrees from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. He has had experience of more than seven years in corporate R&D and over ten years in teaching and academic research. He was with the Indian Institute of Technology, where he directed four Ph.D. dissertations and a large number of graduate and undergraduate theses. He is currently a Faculty Member with the Department of Electrical Engineering, College of Engineering, University of North Texas, Denton. He has published over 40 papers in international journals and conferences and contributed to disparate areas of electrical and computer engineering, which include networking, pattern recognition, computer vision, and computational intelligence.
